attributes.action: Change the laws governing investment companies and banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that banks and financial institutions and companies cannot invest unwisely and profligately where it affects British citizens. To hold those investors personally responsible by law in equal measure to their profits.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/recklessbanks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
